data.prayer: Father, please send teachers of your Word in Sahibganj who can speak your gospel boldly and clearly.

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Sahibganj, Jharkhand, India
data.section_summary: What conditions of religion or environment could you pray for here?

data.prayer: Father, defend those who are loyal to your Word in the county of Sahibganj, even against fierce enemies.
data.verse: Though the wicked bind me with ropes, I will not forget your law.

data.label_1: One disciple of Jesus for every 90 lost neighbors

data.prayer: Spirit, encourage the disciples in Sahibganj, Jharkhand, India to live with urgency and a passion for making more disciples.
data.verse: Yet you do not know what your life will be like tomorrow. you are just a vapor that appears for a little while and then vanishes away.

data.prayer: Father, help the 12,657 believers in Sahibganj to be spiritually intentional with their relationships among their 1,137,944 lost friends and neighbors.
Lord we ask you on behalf of the Angarok people. 0.0% are known to be believers. Oh God, please share with them the great gift of your son Jesus and your kingdom.
God, we ask you to raise up elders and deacons from the 12,657 believers in Sahibganj, who will serve the church and equip it to do your work.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up until we all reach unity in the faith and in the knowledge of the Son of God and become mature, attaining to the whole measure of the fullness of Christ.

data.prayer: Father, please raise up prophets in Sahibganj who can call the church to holiness and purity, preparing your church as a bride for your Son.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.prayer: Father, answer the requests of your people in the county of Sahibganj.
data.verse: This is the boldness which we have toward him, that, if we ask anything according to his will, he listens to us.

location.name: Sahibganj
